posts.post_content:
I know almost everyone heres collects T206 cards but if anyone wants to trade for a Mantle or a few please let me know. I can also add cash or other T206 cards in the deal as well. The Mantles I have are:

1958 Topps Mickey Mantle All Star PSA 5
1960 Topps Rival All Stars Mantle & Boyer PSA 6
1961 Mantle Blasts 565 FT SGC 60/5
1963 Topps Bombers' Best Tresh/Mantle/Richardson PSA 6

If interested I can give photos.

Again I can add Paypal or T206 to the deal if need be.
